plugin.name: mume_report
plugin.author: Nick Stockton
plugin.purpose: Provides aliases for reporting score and needed xp/tp

trigger.name: capture_points
trigger.send: local current = tonumber("%<current>") local max = tonumber("%<max>") if max == nil then Note("Unavailable.") elseif max == 0 then Note(string.format("Character doesn't have %ss.", "%<points>")) else Note(string.format("%d/%d [%.0f%%%] %ss.", current, max, (current >= 0 and current or 0) / max * 100, "%<points>")) end

muclient.script:
will_report_score = false will_report_tnl = false
function score_report() will_report_score = true Send("score") end
function tnl_report() will_report_tnl = true Send("info tnlreport: %X %T %l") end
function score(hp, max_hp, mana, max_mana, mv, max_mv) local points = {} table.insert(points, string.format("HP: %s/%s [%.0f%%]", hp, max_hp, hp / max_hp * 100)) if max_mana ~= "" and max_mana or nil then table.insert(points, string.format("Mana: %s/%s [%.0f%%]", mana, max_mana, mana / max_mana * 100)) end table.insert(points, string.format("Moves: %s/%s [%.0f%%].", mv, max_mv, mv / max_mv * 100)) local output = table.concat(points, ", ") Note(output) if will_report_score then Send("emote reports: ", output) will_report_score = false end end
function tnl(xp, tp, level) local output = string.format("%.3fK XP and %s TP to reach level %s.", xp / 1000, tp, level + 1) Note(string.format("You need %s", output)) if will_report_tnl then Send("emote needs ", output) will_report_tnl = false end end
